title: CISA: China’s Volt Typhoon Hackers Planning Critical Infrastructure Disruption
description:
New CISA alert includes technical mitigations to harden attack surfaces and instructions to hunt for the Chinese government-backed hackers.

The post CISA: China’s Volt Typhoon Hackers Planning Critical Infrastructure Disruption appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Most Linux Systems Exposed to Complete Compromise via Shim Vulnerability
description:
A critical remote code execution vulnerability in Shim could allow attackers to take over vulnerable Linux systems.

The post Most Linux Systems Exposed to Complete Compromise via Shim Vulnerability  appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Device Authority Raises $7M for Enterprise IoT Identity and Access Management Platform
description:
Device Authority raises $7 million in a Series A funding round for its enterprise identity and access management for IoT solution.

The post Device Authority Raises $7M for Enterprise IoT Identity and Access Management Platform  appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Verizon Discloses Internal Data Breach Impacting 63,000 Employees
description:
Verizon is informing 63,000 employees that their personal information was exposed in an internal data breach.

The post Verizon Discloses Internal Data Breach Impacting 63,000 Employees appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: JetBrains Patches Critical Authentication Bypass in TeamCity
description:
JetBrains releases patches for a critical-severity TeamCity authentication bypass leading to remote code execution.

The post JetBrains Patches Critical Authentication Bypass in TeamCity appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Cybersecurity M&A Roundup: 34 Deals Announced in January 2024
description:
Thirty-four cybersecurity-related merger and acquisition (M&A) deals were announced in January 2024.

The post Cybersecurity M&A Roundup: 34 Deals Announced in January 2024 appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Fortinet Patches Critical Vulnerabilities in FortiSIEM
description:
Two critical OS command injection flaws in FortiSIEM could allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

The post Fortinet Patches Critical Vulnerabilities in FortiSIEM appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Meta Says It Will Label AI-Generated Images on Facebook and Instagram
description:
Facebook and Instagram users will start seeing labels on AI-generated images that appear on their social media feeds, as the tech industry aims to sort between what’s real and not.

The post Meta Says It Will Label AI-Generated Images on Facebook and Instagram appeared first on SecurityWeek.
